Generation IX.Scarlet: It immobilizes opponents by bathing them in psychic power from its large eyes. Despite its appearance, it has a vicious temperament.
Generation IX.Violet: It emits psychic power from the gaps between its multicolored frills and sprints at speeds greater than 120 mph .
